characterDescription:
Ralinor is a member of the King's Guard who was not a member of Bridge Four. He was a member of the rear guard - along with Moash - when Kaladin determined that the palace needed to be evacuated at Syl's urging. He was instructed to watch the room in which Elhokar had been, then follow after Kaladin had secreted both the King and Dalinar away.
Ralinor also towed - along with Moash - Navani away from the incident.
